transcripts.text: My name is Mike and I've just read an interesting article I thought I wanted to share with everyone.  It's called Denmark rushes through emergency coronavirus law.  I'll leave all the links below regarding that.  Denmark's parliament.  on Thursday night, this is published on 13th of March 2020, Denmark's parliament on Thursday night unanimously passed on an emergency coronavirus law which gives health authorities powers to force testing, treatment and quarantine with the backing of the police.  The far-reaching new law will remain in force until March 2021 when it will expire under a sunset clause.  I was touched when I saw the whole parliament standing up and voting for this, Health Minister Manges told Danish state broadcaster after law was passed.  It's time to put aside party politics and put together to do what it takes to bring Denmark safely through this situation.  jens elo ritter law professor at copenhagen university said the measures were unlike anything passed in the last seventy-five years.  it is certainly the most extreme since the second world war.  he told the julian's poster newspaper.  there have been some powerful encroachments in various terror packages.  but this goes further.  Trine Maria Lissine, a doctor's court correspondent, said that Danish citizens could face prosecution under the new law if they refused to comply with health authorities' demands.  It means that you could be sentenced to or punished if you, for example, refused to allow yourself to be tested for coronavirus, she said.  the ministry of health will now work with the ministry of justice on the details of how the police will work with health officials to enforce their demands.  as well as enforcing quarantine measures the law also allows the authorities to force people to be vaccinated even though there is currently no vaccination for the virus.  It also empowers them to prohibit access to public institutions, supermarkets and shops, public and private nursing homes and hospitals, and also to impose restrictions on access to public transportation.  so they're starting their new world order agenda there.  see what they're doing is they're trying to force people um with with police to prosecute and put in prison people who don't do what they say.  that includes forced vaccinations and the bible speaks about uh the time of the end when um a mark called the Mark of the Beast, which is, I believe, a microchip vaccination will be given.  And people will either choose to have it or not.  And if you have it, it will send you straight to hell.  And this is the verses in Revelation 13, 16 to 17.  And he causes all, the great and the small, the rich and the poor, the free men and the slaves, to be given a mark on their right hand or on their forehead.  And he provides... that no one will be able to buy or sell except the one who has the mark, either the name of the beast or the number of his name.  So you won't be able to buy or sell or have food without this mark they give you.  Revelation 49-10.  Then another angel, a third one, followed them, saying with a loud voice, If anyone worships the beast and his image and receives a mark on his forehead or in his hand, he also will drink of the wine of the wrath of God, which is mixed in full strength in a cup of his anger.  And he will be tormented with fire and brimstone in the presence of the holy angels and in the presence of the Lamb.  Another one here as well.  Revelation 13, 17 to 10.  And it was given to him to make war with the saints and to overcome them.  And authority over every tribe and people and tongue and nation was given to him.  All who dwell on earth will worship him.  Everyone whose name has not been written from the foundation of the world in the book of life who has been slain.  And another one, Revelation 13, 17.  And he provides that no one will be able to buy or sell except the one who has the mark, either the name of the beast or the number of his name.  So you can't buy or sell or do anything without this mark.  So we need to avoid this mark of the beast.  It's going to be either vaccination, whether it's this vaccination coming up very soon about the coronavirus or the next virus is coming along.  There's going to be a vaccination there.  that will have a microchip that will change your dna so you can't be redeemed and he'll send you straight to hell.  they know the enemy knows that god is coming soon.  so he wants to wipe out as much as mankind as possible before they can be saved and that by doing that they're doing it now.  they're enclosing people quarantining people and then with this virus man-made virus they brought out.  they're going to bring a vac obviously bring a vaccination and of their own.  for these they cause the problem the virus they want.  people want a solution and the government gives them one by locking them all down and then soon.
